function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate data collection methods for COVID-19 cases and climatic indicators","Impact":"Inaccurate analysis and conclusions about the correlation between climate and COVID-19 spread","Mitigation":"Implement standardized data collection methods and ensure data accuracy","Technologies":"Data validation tools, statistical software for analysis","People":"Research team, data analysts, public health officials","Owner":"Research team, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lag between date of actual cases and date of reporting","Impact":"Delayed response and decision-making in controlling the spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Develop real-time reporting systems and improve data timeliness","Technologies":"Real-time data collection and reporting tools","People":"Public health officials, data analysts","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Population density as a factor in COVID-19 spread","Impact":"High population density may contribute to increased transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implement targeted public health interventions in high-density areas, promote social distancing, and improve healthcare capacity","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, data visualization software, communication platforms","People":"Public health officials, urban planners, local government","Owner":"Public health organizations, local government"}]}
